sources.title: Pilot X (1936)
sources.description: Someone in a mysterious black plane is on a murderous rampage shooting other planes out of the sky. AKA "Death In The Air".

sources.title: Pilot X  (1936) Death in the Air
sources.description:
Stars: Lona Andre, John Carroll, Leon Ames 
Director: Elmer Clifton

After several aircraft are shot down by a phantom black plane with a big "X" painted on the wing, the key suspects are invited to an old dark mansion. Also Known as "Death in the Air"

sources.title: Pilot_X__1936
sources.description: Lots of biplane action and mystery. A mysterious black biplane, with a large X painted on the fuselage and wings, is shooting other planes out of the American skies. The best fighter pilots from all over the world are invited to a mansion, brought together to team up, locate, and shoot down Pilot X. Pretty quickly, they realize that Pilot X is one of the team members; but which one? I downloaded the source file, from this site; cleaned the pop and hiss out of the audio, and here's the new "improved" copy.

metadata.Plot: Planes are being shot down by a large black plane with a large "X" painted on the wing. The chief suspects are invited for the weekend to an old dark mansion.
metadata.Actors: Lona Andre, John Carroll, Leon Ames
